resources.string:
Version 3.1.0

- Removed Themes
Tabs Layout with calculator in main tab
- Bug fixes and enhancements

Version 3.0.5

- Themes!! in the settings
- Bug fixes and enhancements

Version 3.0.3

- Fixed Calculator not starting
- Added Multiwindow Support
- Security Enhancements (App will close after 60 minutes from the time it started)
- General UI enhancements
